comment: Smooth and consistent. Straight out of Ireland
Very light and refreshing. Hint of Sherry comes thru early and the Bourbon on the finish. 80 proof.
Great contrast of flavors through the tasting. Lots of sweet, then smoky, then sweet.
Nice taste. A less of spirit in nose and taste. Very dry taste that I very like in whisky
Caramel and vanilla notes, tapers off with maple.  Smells like a wet dog at first, cleans up after a little water and time.
A very different Jameson, lots of bourbon flavor.  Easy supper and great price (€22 duty free).
Almost sweet, smooth, lacking just a bit roundness to be compared with single malts. Ideal to have with dark orange chocolate. For 22e airport price, it's an outstanding value!
